00030 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00031 #  include <config.h>
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 #include <glib.h>
00035 #include <dbus/dbus-glib.h>
00036 #include "gpm_marshal.h"
00037 #include "dbus-common.h"
00038 
00043 gboolean
00044 dbus_glib_error (GError *error)
00045 {
00046     g_return_val_if_fail (error, FALSE);
00047     if (error->domain == DBUS_GERROR && error->code == DBUS_GERROR_REMOTE_EXCEPTION)
00048         g_debug ("Caught remote method exception %s: %s",
00049                     dbus_g_error_get_name (error),
00050                     error->message);
00051     else
00052         g_debug ("Error: %s", error->message);
00053     g_error_free (error);
00054     return TRUE;
00055 }
00056 
00063 gboolean
00064 dbus_get_service (DBusGConnection *connection, const gchar *service)
00065 {
00066     DBusGProxy *bus_proxy = NULL;
00067     GError *error = NULL;
00068     gboolean ret = TRUE;
00069     guint request_name_result;
00070 
00071     /* assertion checks */
00072     g_assert (connection);
00073     g_assert (service);
00074 
00075     bus_proxy = dbus_g_proxy_new_for_name (connection, 
00076         DBUS_SERVICE_DBUS,
00077         DBUS_PATH_DBUS,
00078         DBUS_INTERFACE_DBUS);
00079 
00080     if (!dbus_g_proxy_call (bus_proxy, "RequestName", &error,
00081         G_TYPE_STRING, service,
00082         G_TYPE_UINT, DBUS_NAME_FLAG_PROHIBIT_REPLACEMENT,
00083         G_TYPE_INVALID,
00084         G_TYPE_UINT, &request_name_result,
00085         G_TYPE_INVALID)) {
00086         g_error ("Failed to acquire %s: %s", service, error->message);
00087         ret = FALSE;
00088     }
00089 
00090     if (ret && request_name_result != 1 /* NEED_TO_FIND_VALUE */)
00091         ret = FALSE;
00092 
00093     /* free the bus_proxy */
00094     g_object_unref (G_OBJECT (bus_proxy));
00095     return ret;
00096 }
00097 
00107 gboolean
00108 dbus_get_session_connection (DBusGConnection **connection)
00109 {
00110     GError *error = NULL;
00111     *connection = dbus_g_bus_get (DBUS_BUS_SESSION, &error);
00112     if (*connection == NULL) {
00113         g_warning ("Failed to open connection to dbus session bus: %s\n",
00114             error->message);
00115         dbus_glib_error (error);
00116         g_print ("This program cannot start until you start the dbus"
00117              "session daemon\n"
00118              "This is usually started in X or gnome startup "
00119              "(depending on distro)\n"
00120              "You can launch the session dbus-daemon manually with"
00121              "this command:\n"
00122              "eval `dbus-launch --auto-syntax`\n\n"
00123              "If this works, add \"dbus-lauch --auto-syntax\" "
00124              "to ~/.xinitrc\n\n");
00125         return FALSE;
00126     }
00127     return TRUE;
00128 }
00129 
00137 gboolean
00138 dbus_get_system_connection (DBusGConnection **connection)
00139 {
00140     GError *error = NULL;
00141     *connection = dbus_g_bus_get (DBUS_BUS_SYSTEM, &error);
00142     if (*connection == NULL) {
00143         g_warning ("Failed to open connection to dbus system bus: %s\n",
00144             error->message);
00145         dbus_glib_error (error);
00146         g_print ("This program cannot start until you start the dbus"
00147              "system daemon\n"
00148              "This is usually started in initscripts, and is "
00149              "usually called messagebus\n"
00150              "It is STRONGLY recommended you reboot your compter"
00151              "after restarting messagebus\n\n");
00152         return FALSE;
00153     }
00154     return TRUE;
00155 }
